snippet.title: Gray Zone Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
The best way to show your support and check out the latest information is to follow us on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1207320/Gray_Zone/

Real-time tactical strategy game for PC Windows. Early access April 2020 on Steam. by Eastworks s.r.o.

As a former slave your must reunite your nation, fight back against those that oppressed you! Know when to use brawn and when to use your brains, do you have what it takes? 

GRAY ZONE is a narrative driven tactical strategy game with elements of RPG made by EastWorks studio. 

Visit our official channels for more information:
Website: https://grayzonegame.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/grayzonegame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GRAYZONE6
